mean_cn: n. 舷侧，较宽的一面，一连串的诽谤，排炮般的攻击；  v. （船）侧着前进；  adv. （船，车等）侧向，露出侧面，齐射地，胡乱地
mean_en: an attack by a ship in which all the guns on one side of the ship are fired together
word_etyma: broad宽阔的+side边，侧面 → 较宽的一面
sentence: Any other boat that came broadside of us would be sunk by our cannons.
sentence_trans: 任何靠近我们舷侧的船都会被炮轰至沉入海底。
